title: Forecast for the number of new hotel rooms opening in Europe from 2012 to 2016
summary: This statistic shows the Number of Europe ( LoL ) monthly active rooms worldwide from 2012 to 2016 .
In 2016 , LoL had 34060 % Europe , up from 34451 % in 2015 .
Being one of the most prominent eSports games , in 2015 LoL championship finals attracted 36 million viewers worldwide .
